JULY 6, 2017 <[[https://content.pivotal.io/analyst-reports/gartner-critical-capabilities-for-data-management-solutions-for-analytics?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=newsletter]]> Gartner Critical Capabilities for Data Management Solutions for Analytics Data and analytics leaders are being tasked with modernizing their information infrastructure. They have to navigate an evolving landscape driven by new deployment scenarios, data sources, and analytics requirements. This report uses a combination of product capabilities and customer experiences to evaluate 20 vendors across 10 functional capabilities to help data and analytics professionals make the right choice for their needs. Read The Report <[[https://content.pivotal.io/analyst-reports/gartner-critical-capabilities-for-data-management-solutions-for-analytics?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=newsletter]]> <[[https://builttoadapt.io/devops-is-not-a-role-63fb8d62b0f6?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=newsletter]]> DevOps is Not a Role A simple comic that explains how DevOps is more than just "Developers + Operations."
